headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Don’t Be a Bad Sport
content:
Bad Sports won’t prosper for very long – they end up in the Bad Sport pool.

If you encounter a toxic player ruining your fun, you can Report them by viewing their player card (via Online > Players in the Pause Menu) and selecting ‘Report.’ You can also specify your reason for reporting them, all within a few steps.

Players reported frequently will be made to wear a Dunce hat and play in the Bad Sport pool with all the other reprobates.
